Name: Flashover MegaSector
About the game: Flashover MegaSector is a shoot 'em up built to look like a browser game from roughly a decade ago. Simplistic shapes, tons of gradients, simple yet intriguing mechanics, and engaging level design are present to try to remind one of browser games, while still doing its best to just plain be a good shoot 'em up along the way. Notable features: Simple controls! Simple yet pleasant vector graphics! Soundtrack built around royalty-free songs for extra authenticity to browser games of the era! Levels change based on what you do in the previous level for added replay value! Game tracks your highest score to keep you pushing forwards! A tiny hitbox on your ship keeps the toughest of situations manageable! Really low price of $1!
